title: Run for 10 minutes
description: Put on your shoes and jog around the block.

title: Touch grass
description: Go outside and connect with nature for 5 minutes.

title: Eat one fruit
description: Apples, bananas, or oranges. Your body needs vitamins.

title: Send reels to your friend
description: Find something funny and share it. Stay connected.

title: Text your family
description: Just a simple "How are you?" goes a long way.

title: Read 3 pages
description: Pick up that book you have been ignoring.
